meanings.definition: To attempt to do or achieve something again.
meanings.sent1: She kept retrying the puzzle until she finally solved it.
meanings.sent2: I will be retrying the recipe to see if I can get it right this time.
meanings.sent3: After retrying the jump multiple times, he decided to take a break and try again later.
meanings.sent4: The athlete kept retrying the high jump, determined to clear the bar.
meanings.sent5: With each retrying effort, she felt more confident in her ability to succeed.

meanings.definition: The act of trying something again.
meanings.sent1: His retrying of the experiment yielded different results the second time.
meanings.sent2: The retrying of the game level became frustrating after multiple attempts.
meanings.sent3: The retrying of the song on the radio made her realize it was her favorite tune.
meanings.sent4: The retrying of the knot only made it tighter and harder to undo.
meanings.sent5: Through his retrying, he discovered new ways to approach the problem.
